entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
